text: hrux kaneid dı cak thi khæng ying nı hawxk khxng phwk than ktam dangnan phwk khea ca klaw wa phu dı lea ca hı rea klab khun ma xik cng klaw theid (muhammad) phraxngkh phuthrng bangkeid phwk than tæ khrang ræk læw phwk khea k san sirsʹa khxng phwk khea kæ cea phlang klaw wa meux dı lea cng klaw theid (muhammad) hwang wa man kıl khea ma læw
